title: What am I doing worng?
author: t2_b52k2t9
text:
I've solved this code in python with a for loop but I can't figure out how to solve this in flode... Can someone tell me what I'm doing wrong?

Here is a link to the code: 

[https://imgur.com/lrPrBV3](https://imgur.com/lrPrBV3)

comments.author: a1brit
comments.body:
This doesn't seem like a python question. 
Your output seems to contain more than "only 12 numbers" though.  Did you include the "output0:" or is that part of whatever thing this is.

comments.author: OzneroI
comments.body:
Seems like you’re outputting 12 times when it seems to want you to output a string of 12 numbers once. 

1, 2, 3, 4 etc 

Not 

1 

2

3

4

etc 

You could do an 

n = x 

print(f”{n}, {n * 2}, {n * 3},....”)
